name: Ahmed SALVADOR, Appellant, v. ATLANTIC STEEL BOILER COMPANY, I. H. English of Philadelphia, Inc., Irwin H. English Company, Walter K. Mueller and Julia M. Mueller, his wife, and United Machine & Tool Company, Walter K. Mueller and Julia M. Mueller, his wife, and McKelvey Bros.
name_abbreviation: Salvador v. Atlantic Steel Boiler Co.

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: Ahmed SALVADOR, Appellant, v. ATLANTIC STEEL BOILER COMPANY, I. H. English of Philadelphia, Inc., Irwin H. English Company, Walter K. Mueller and Julia M. Mueller, his wife, and United Machine & Tool Company, Walter K. Mueller and Julia M. Mueller, his wife, and McKelvey Bros.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The Order of the Superior Court is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Carl M. Mazzocone, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Charles W. Craven, Philadelphia, for appellee, I. H. English, et al.
Ronald H. Sherr, Philadelphia, for appellee, Walter K. Mueller, et al.
casebody.head_matter:
424 A.2d 497
Ahmed SALVADOR, Appellant, v. ATLANTIC STEEL BOILER COMPANY, I. H. English of Philadelphia, Inc., Irwin H. English Company, Walter K. Mueller and Julia M. Mueller, his wife, and United Machine & Tool Company, Walter K. Mueller and Julia M. Mueller, his wife, and McKelvey Bros.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 22, 1980.
Decided Jan. 27, 1981.
Carl M. Mazzocone, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Charles W. Craven, Philadelphia, for appellee, I. H. English, et al.
Ronald H. Sherr, Philadelphia, for appellee, Walter K. Mueller, et al.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
